src:
Zvezdin tandem neizvestan za Totenhem
04 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Darko
Crvena zvezda u sredu dočekuje Totenhem u 4. kolu Lige šampiona, a neizvesno je da li će Vladan Milojević na raspolaganju imati najjači tim.
Dvojica igrača koja su zbog povreda propustila utakmicu sa Proleterom u subotu, pod upitnikom su i za duel sa Totenhemom.
U pitanju su Marko Gobeljić i Aleksa Vukanović, koji imaju problema sa povredama. Desni bek je osetio bol u listu tokom meča sa TSC-om, a napadač je dobio jak udarac u zglob, prenosi Sportski žurnal.
Gobeljić i Vukanovć su u nedelju trenirali smanjenim intenzitetom, a očekuje se da danas provere zdravstvenu spremnost na ključnom treningu pred meč sa Totenhemom.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Star tandem unknown to Tottenham
04 Nov 2019, 09:40 by Darko
The Red Star welcomed Tottenham in the 4th round of the Champions League on Wednesday, and it is uncertain whether Vladan Milojevic will have the strongest team at his disposal.
The two players who missed the game against Proleter on Saturday are also questioned for a duel with Tottenham.
They are Marko Gobeljic and Aleksa Vukanovic, who have problems with injuries. The right back felt pain in the sheet during a match with TSC, and the attacker received a severe blow to the ankle, reports the Sports Journal.
Gobeljic and Vukanovic were training at a reduced intensity on Sunday, and are expected to test their health readiness today at a crucial pre-match training with Tottenham.
